name: aMaze Friend
description:
Game Story

The game takes place in a desktop environment, where you receive an email about your friend being kidnapped and stuck in a maze. You couldn't believe what you were reading, until you see photos of your friend lying down with a blind fold. Stressed about what you saw, you decide to click on the link and two applications are downloaded: a Maze Map and a Chat.

Game Objective

Using two applications (Maze Map and Chat), you will direct your friend to the exit of the maze, while being aware of a killer trying to kill your friend and viruses trying to stop you from communicating with him.
